about.summary: A system for querying, retrieving and analyzing protocol- and results-related information on clinical trials from three public registers, the 'European Union Clinical Trials Register' ('EUCTR', <https://www.clinicaltrialsregister.eu/>), 'ClinicalTrials.gov' ('CTGOV', <https://clinicaltrials.gov/>), the 'ISRCTN' (<http://www.isrctn.com/>) and the 'European Union Clinical Trials Information System' ('CTIS', <https://euclinicaltrials.eu/>). Trial information is downloaded, converted and stored in a database ('PostgreSQL', 'SQLite', 'DuckDB' or 'MongoDB'; via package 'nodbi'). Functions are included to identify deduplicated records, to easily find and extract variables (fields) of interest even from complex nesting as used by the registers, and to update previous queries. The package can be used for meta-analysis and trend-analysis of the design and conduct as well as for results of clinical trials.

A system for querying, retrieving and analyzing protocol- and results-related information on clinical trials from three public registers, the 'European Union Clinical Trials Register' ('EUCTR', <https://www.clinicaltrialsregister.eu/>), 'ClinicalTrials.gov' ('CTGOV', <https://clinicaltrials.gov/>), the 'ISRCTN' (<http://www.isrctn.com/>) and the 'European Union Clinical Trials Information System' ('CTIS', <https://euclinicaltrials.eu/>). Trial information is downloaded, converted and stored in a database ('PostgreSQL', 'SQLite', 'DuckDB' or 'MongoDB'; via package 'nodbi'). Functions are included to identify deduplicated records, to easily find and extract variables (fields) of interest even from complex nesting as used by the registers, and to update previous queries. The package can be used for meta-analysis and trend-analysis of the design and conduct as well as for results of clinical trials.

name: r-ctrdata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.24.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ctrdata
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ctrdata_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ctrdata/ctrdata_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: a6ad5a8e783bcb990d06f70de0217c331a0cf9c9646edb71ab42172ae150f96d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-v8
    - r-dplyr
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-httr2
    - r-jqr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lubridate
    - r-nodbi >=0.10.7
    - r-readr
    - r-rlang
    - r-rvest
    - r-stringdist
    - r-stringi
    - r-tidyr
    - r-xml2
    - r-zip
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-v8
    - r-dplyr
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-httr2
    - r-jqr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lubridate
    - r-nodbi >=0.10.7
    - r-readr
    - r-rlang
    - r-rvest
    - r-stringdist
    - r-stringi
    - r-tidyr
    - r-xml2
    - r-zip

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ctrdata')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ctrdata')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/package=ctrdata, https://rfhb.github.io/ctrdata/
  license: MIT
  summary: A system for querying, retrieving and analyzing protocol- and results-related information on clinical trials from three public registers, the 'European Union Clinical Trials Register' ('EUCTR', <https://www.clinicaltrialsregister.eu/>), 'ClinicalTrials.gov' ('CTGOV', <https://clinicaltrials.gov/>), the 'ISRCTN'
    (<http://www.isrctn.com/>) and the 'European Union Clinical Trials Information System' ('CTIS', <https://euclinicaltrials.eu/>). Trial information is downloaded, converted and stored in a database ('PostgreSQL', 'SQLite', 'DuckDB' or 'MongoDB'; via package 'nodbi'). Functions are included to identify deduplicated records,
    to easily find and extract variables (fields) of interest even from complex nesting as used by the registers, and to update previous queries. The package can be used for meta-analysis and trend-analysis of the design and conduct as well as for results of clinical trials.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
